title: How life begins
creator_credit: Jules Power Productions, American Broadcasting Company, Daniel Wilson and Gene Feldman
brief_description: Provides an understanding of the many and varied ways in which organisms, both simple and complex, reproduce. Introduces concepts of mitosis, courtship, nesting, fertilization and embryological development. Narrated by Eddie Albert.
creator_credit_for_label: Jules Power Productions, American Broadcasting Company, Daniel Wilson and Gene Feldman
